title: An Introduction to the art of figure skating
creator_credit: Sydney Newman and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The fundamentals of figure skating are demonstrated by world champion Barbara Ann Scott and coach and judge Melville Rogers. A brief discussion of edges and basic figures is followed by an analysis of a number of complex turns. The importance of balance, body, and limbs is explained.
